zuul.timerunner.pkg_others

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • zuul.timerunner.pkg_others.UserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.KeyEventDispatcher, java.util.EventListener

    public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.KeyEventDispatcher
    This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
    Version:
    18/02/2013
    Author:
    Michael Kolling, ASTIER Naji & ROBIN Yohann
